name: BLACK Croix De Candlestick T-Shirt *WOMEN'S SIZE*
description:
This is a tribute to the classic pins that were handed out to those who stayed to watch the San Francisco Giants play extra inning night games at Candlestick Park.  Wear these shirts with pride and pay homage to the old school!

Buy two and get free shipping!

www.facebook.com/candlestickshirts
